pages.text: $(li)A Jack o'Lantern is the $(l:patchouli:decoration/autumnity/jack_o_lanterns)Jack'o Lantern$(/l) $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/redstone_lamp)Redstone Lamp$(/l) version.
pages.title: Redstone Jack Lantern

pages.text: $(li)As the $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/redstone_lamp)Redstone Lamp$(/l), the Redstone Jack o'Lantern can only be turned on with a redstone signal.
